channel.title: Hello Hugo on Moorlag's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hello Hugo on Moorlag's Blog

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Hello and welcome, This is my first blog based on the Go Hugo framework. This framework runs locally on my machine and generates output that can be hosted without a database. Cool! And, everything page and post is based on MarkDown. Isn’t that cool?
item.content:
Hello and welcome,

This is my first blog based on the Go Hugo framework. This framework runs locally on my machine and generates output that can be hosted without a database. Cool! And, everything page and post is based on MarkDown. Isn’t that cool?
